pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Telliot FeedsThis package contains reporting tools and datafeeds for Tellor oracles.## [Documentation](https://tellor-io.github.io/telliot-feeds/)## [Installation and Configuration](https://tellor-io.github.io/telliot-feeds/getting-started/)## [Usage](https://tellor-io.github.io/telliot-feeds/usage/)## ExampleReport using the CLI:```telliot report -a myacct```
